
# Sample Project

## Description

This is a sample project used to demonstrate the functionalities of this app

## Table of Contents

* [Installation](#installation)
* [Usage](#usage)
* [License](#license)
* [Contributing](#contributing)
* [Tests](#tests)
* [Questions](#questions)

## Installation

You will need to install "inquirer" by typing "npm i inquirer@8.2.4" to use this app

## Usage

This app is used for generating readme.md for your project.
